ERROR_AUTHORITY_GROUP_EDIT_DISABLED.en: You can't edit this authority group

ERROR_AMOUNT_EXCEED_REQUEST.en: Payout amount can't exceed request amount
ERROR_AMOUNT_EXCEED_REQUEST.kr: 납부 금액은 청구 금액을 초과할 수 없습니다

ERROR_AMOUNT_EXCEED_PAYOUT.en: Refund amount can't exceed payout amount
ERROR_AMOUNT_EXCEED_PAYOUT.kr: 환불 금액은 납부 금액을 초과할 수 없습니다

ERROR_IMAGE_TOO_BIG.en: Image size should be less than 300kb

ERROR_IMAGE_VALIDATE.en:
Images can only be attached to JPG/JPEG/PNG 
less than 1MB. If the width or height exceeds 1,000px,
it will be resized and sent.
ERROR_IMAGE_VALIDATE.kr:
이미지는 1MB이하의 JPG/JPEG만 첨부가능하며 
가로 또는 세로가 1,000px 이상시, 리사이징되어 전송됩니다

ERROR_SMS_SEND_PAYLOAD.en: Please check required fields (SMS Type, Caller Number, SMS Notification Type, Contents, No. SMS Targets, Scheduled At if it's scheduled SMS)
ERROR_SMS_SEND_PAYLOAD.kr: 필수항목들을 확인해주세요 (문자타입, 발신번호, 전송타입, 내용, 전송대상 고객 수, 예약전송이라면 예약시간)

ERROR_EXCEEDED_IMAGE_SIZE_300KB.en: Select an image of 300KB or less.

ERROR_EXCEEDED_IMAGE_SIZE_1MB.en: Select an image of 1MB or less.

ERROR_EXCEEDED_MESSAGE_TITLE.en: You cannot enter over 40 bytes in the text message title.

ERROR_EXCEEDED_MESSAGE_CONTENTS.en: You cannot enter over 2000 bytes as text message content.

ERROR_CTI_CLOSE_FIRST.en: Please end ongoing first before starting another call.
ERROR_CTI_CLOSE_FIRST.kr: 상담 중이시던 상담을 완료하신 후 다른 상담을 시작해 주세요.
